name: Warehouse of the Damned
description: //***************// You have entered Deimos Base, a safe place turned into a living Hell. The complex is enormous, so you choosed the closest path - the Warehouse: a vast Containment Area composed of refineries and storage rooms. Even though you know those demon intruders are there, everything is too quiet. A flickering crimson eye here and a moving shadow there are signs that those evil beasts have prepared an ambush. Watch your steps, Marine, teir rending vicious claws are ready to puncture your lungs! //****************//
